Result.Text: Authenticating an user
keep my settings and preferences protected and synchronized with the 8tracks service
to use the application with my user credentials
logging in a user with invalid user credentials
the user provides inorrect username and password
the application issues a command to log in the user
the authenticator executes a login request
the user should not be logged in
the user token does not exist

any conditions
the application does not set the password
the application issues a command to log in the user
the user should not be logged in
the user token does not exist

Story.Name: Favoriting items in the media library

Result.Text: Favoriting items in the media library
find items in the media library easily
to be able to star/unstar items in the media library
Liking a mix
a mix is not liked by current user
the application issues a command to toggle liking a mix
the media library browser executes a EightTracksPlayer.Communication.Requests.ToggleMixLikeRequest
the mix should be liked by the current user

Browsing available mixes
select the mix I want to listen to
the system to provide me with an overview of mixes in several categories
filtering available mixes by tags and other keywords
the view type is Recent
the tags are jazz and hiphop and cover
the query is summer hit
the application issues a command to create mixes request
the GET request should be properly created
the uri should be http://8tracks.com/mixes.xml?api_key=ABC123&sort=recent&per_page=20&page=1&tags=jazz hiphop cover&q=summer hit
Authenticating an user
keep my settings and preferences protected and synchronized with the 8tracks service
to use the application with my user credentials
creating a request to log in
api key is ABC123
the application issues a command to create a login request with username myUsername and password myPassword
the POST request should be properly created
the uri should be http://8tracks.com/sessions.xml?api_key=ABC123
the post data should be login=myUsername&password=myPassword
Browsing available mixes
select the mix I want to listen to
the system to provide me with an overview of mixes in several categories
creating a request for obtaining latest mixes when no user is logged in
api key is ABC123
the user token is ""
the view type is Recent
the application issues a command to create mixes request
the GET request should be properly created
the uri should be http://8tracks.com/mixes.xml?api_key=ABC123&sort=recent&per_page=20&page=1
creating a request for obtaining latest mixes when a user is logged in
api key is ABC123
the user token is abcdefg
the view type is Recent
the application issues a command to create mixes request
the GET request should be properly created
the uri should be http://8tracks.com/mixes.xml?api_key=ABC123&sort=recent&user_token=abcdefg&per_page=20&page=1
creating a request for obtaining second set of mixes
api key is ABC123
the user token is abcdefg
the view type is Recent
the page numer is 3 with 15 mixes per page
the application issues a command to create mixes request
the GET request should be properly created
the uri should be http://8tracks.com/mixes.xml?api_key=ABC123&sort=recent&user_token=abcdefg&per_page=15&page=3
Playing a mix
enjoy the music of a certain mix
to play a mix
creating a request for obtaining the play token needed to start streaming music
api key is ABC123
the application issues a command to create new play token request
the GET request should be properly created
the uri should be http://8tracks.com/sets/new.xml?api_key=ABC123

avoid manually switching to the next track
to enjoy music with the least amount of interaction
the system to automaticallly start playing the next track, once a track is over
to play a similar mix, once a mix ends
creating a request to get the next mix in the mix set
api key is ABC123
the application issues a command to create next song request for mix with id 500 within a set 150000 using a token 1234509876
the GET request should be properly created
the uri should be http://8tracks.com/sets/1234509876/next_mix.xml?mix_id=500&api_key=ABC123&mix_set_id=150000

to play a mix

api key is ABC123
the application issues a command to create play mix request for mix with id 500 using a token 1234509876
the GET request should be properly created
the uri should be http://8tracks.com/sets/1234509876/play.xml?mix_id=500&api_key=ABC123

Story.Name: Favoriting items in the media library

Result.Text: Favoriting items in the media library
find items in the media library easily
to be able to star/unstar items in the media library
Creating a request to toggle liking a mix
api key is ABC123
the user token is abcdefg
the application issues a command to create a toggle like mix request for mix id 500
the POST request should be properly created
the uri should be http://8tracks.com/mixes/500/toggle_like.xml?user_token=abcdefg&api_key=ABC123
the post data should be ""

select the mix I want to listen to
the system to provide me with an overview of mixes in several categories

the user token is abcdefg
the user identifier is MrJohnDoe
the view type is Liked
the application issues a command to create a user Liked mixes request for user MrJohnDoe
the GET request should be properly created
the uri should be http://8tracks.com/users/MrJohnDoe/mixes.xml?api_key=ABC123&user_token=abcdefg&view=liked&per_page=20&page=1
creating a request for obtaining second set of mixes
api key is ABC123
the user token is abcdefg
the view type is Liked
the user identifier is MrJohnDoe
the page numer is 1 with 20 mixes per page
the application issues a command to create more mixes request
the GET request should be properly created
the uri should be http://8tracks.com/users/MrJohnDoe/mixes.xml?api_key=ABC123&user_token=abcdefg&view=liked&per_page=20&page=2
